a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Bipolar disorder prevalence, males vs. females, 2021
Estimated share of males versus females who have bipolar disorder, whether or not they are diagnosed, based on
representative surveys, medical data and statistical modelling.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
